parameters.query: SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = '{{ $json.email }}' LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO users (email, password_hash, first_name, last_name, is_verified, is_active, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.email }}',
  crypt('{{ $json.password }}', gen_salt('bf')),
  '{{ $json.firstName }}',
  '{{ $json.lastName }}',
  false,
  true,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
RETURNING id, email, first_name, last_name, is_verified, is_active, created_at

INSERT INTO sessions (user_id, access_token, refresh_token, expires_at, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.userId }}',
  '{{ $json.accessToken }}',
  '{{ $json.refreshToken }}',
  '{{ $json.expiresAt }}',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
RETURNING id
